element.label: FamilyHistorySummaryItemR1
element.definition: A summary of significant health and related issues in family members.

element.label: Overview
element.definition: Narrative summary about problems, diagnoses, psychosocial, environmental and genetic markers that have been identified in family members.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this family history summary was last updated.

element.label: FamilyHistoryExclusionItemR1
element.definition: A positive statement about no known past family history, accurate only at the time of recording.

element.label: FamilyHistoryExclusionStatement
element.definition: Positive statement that there is no known significant family history.

element.label: FamilyHistoryAbsenceItemR1
element.definition: A positive statement of absence of information about known family history, accurate only at the time of recording.

element.label: FamilyHistoryAbsenceStatement
element.definition: Positive statement that no information is available about family history.
